question: Refer to the description <image 1>, which term refers to the choices a writer makes, including the combination of distinctive features such as mood, voice, or word choice?
description: The image depicts a pile of magnetic poetry tiles scattered on a white surface. Each tile has a single word printed on it in black text. The words visible include "leave," "purple," "moment," "whisper," "spring," "those," "picture," "behind," "you," and "time." The tiles are randomly arranged, creating a chaotic yet intriguing visual effect.
